text:
Wei Wuxian tidak menjawabnya hanya terus membuang muka dengan tangan terkepal. “Sembuhkan A-Yuan dan.. aku akan menjelaskannya nanti.”
Lan Wangji masih menatap wajah Wei Wuxian tetapi dia tidak bisa menemukan jawaban dari wajah itu yang tertutup dengan rambut.
Dada Lan Wangji masih berdegup keras. Jika benar, ini menjelaskan semuanya. Kesamaannya dengan Wei Wuxian; mata perak, senyum secerah mentari. Kenapa dia merasa begitu dekat dan ingin terus dekat dengan anak itu.
“Ini A-Yuan, aku melahirkannya!”
Umur A-Yuan 3 tahun dan sudah tiga tahun berlalu semenjak kejadian gua Xuanwu. Nyaris ahun Wei Wuxia menghilang sejak penyerangan di Lotus Pier. Semuanya begitu jelas di mata Lan Wangji sekarang.
“Gege.. kepala A-Yuan sakit, gege.” Rintihnya pelan.
Lan Wangji tersadar dari lamunannya dan segera menatap A-Yuan kembali. “Sudah berapa lama?”
trans:
Wei Wuxian doesn't answer it, she looks away and clenched her fist. "Cure A-Yuan and.. I will explain later."
Lan Wangji keep staring at Wei Wuxian's face but he can't find an answer from that face, which is covered by hair.
Lan Wangji's chest continues to beat hardly. If it's true, this explains everything. Her similarity with Wei Wuxian; silver eyes, smile as bright as the sun. The reason why he feel so close and want to stay closely with the child.
"This is A-Yuan, I gave birth to her!"
A-Yuan is 3 years old and it has been three years since the Xuanwu cave incident. It's been years since Wei Wuxia disappeared from the ambush at Lotus Pier. Everything is clear in Lan Wangji's eyes now.
"Brother.. A-Yuan's head hurts, brother." he whimpered quietly.
Lan Wangji come to his sense and quickly stared back at A-Yuan. "How long has it been?"
